name: Space Theater
notes: Behind Fleet Science Center, accessed from Park Blvd. Previously called North Pepper Grove lot. Walking access to Natural History Museum, Casa del Prado Theatre, Casa de Balboa.

name: Casa de Balboa
notes: Behind Casa de Balboa building, accessed from Park Blvd. Walking access to Museum of Photographic Arts, Model Railroad Museum, History Center.

name: Alcazar Garden
address: 2170 Pan American Rd, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: Surface parking lot near Alcazar Garden and The Prado. Near House of Charm tram stop.

name: Organ Pavilion
address: 2125 Pan American Rd E, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: Located near the Spreckels Organ Pavilion. Tram stop on site. Convenient for Japanese Friendship Garden and international cottages.

name: Palisades
address: 2175 Pan American Rd, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: Formerly Pan American Plaza lot. Near Comic-Con Museum, Air & Space Museum, and Municipal Gymnasium. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Bea Evenson
notes: On Village Place Rd, east of Natural History Museum. Walking access to Fleet Science Center, Spanish Village Art Center, Botanical Building. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: South Carousel
notes: Near Balboa Park Carousel and Spanish Village Art Center.

name: Pepper Grove
notes: Adjacent to Space Theater lot, behind Fleet Science Center. Near Pepper Grove Playground. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Federal Building
address: 2490 Pan American Plaza, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: Smaller lot near Federal Building. Free tram stop nearby. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Marston Point
notes: Southwest mesa, off Balboa Dr near Bankers Hill. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Inspiration Point (Upper)
address: 2040 Pan American Rd, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: Large lot at east end of park. Free tram stop available for shuttle to central attractions. Near Veterans Museum. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Inspiration Point (Lower)
address: 2050 Pan American Rd, San Diego, CA 92101
notes: First 3 hours free for all visitors. Adjacent to upper lot tram stop. Becomes free for verified city residents March 2, 2026.

name: Morley Field
address: 2221 Morley Field Dr, San Diego, CA 92104
notes: Free parking serving Morley Field Sports Complex (disc golf, tennis, pool, dog park). Located in northeast section of the park, outside the paid parking zone.

name: Gold Gulch
notes: Small informal lot in canyon between Organ Pavilion and Zoo. Named after the 1935 Exposition's Gold Gulch mining town. Used as overflow parking and tram staging area. Free and outside the paid parking zone.

name: Centro Cultural de la Raza
notes: Tiny building-frontage parking area in front of Centro Cultural de la Raza. Free and outside the paid parking zone. Very limited spaces.

name: Presidents Way
notes: Small parking area along Presidents Way near Park Blvd intersection. May partially overlap with metered street parking along the road. Free and outside the named paid lot system.
